channel.title: Ghosts on Sneha Mayya
channel.description: Recent content in Ghosts on Sneha Mayya

item.title: Chapter 1
item.description: “Welcome to Real-imination Tower! A game based off of the famous one and only platform for gaming- Roblox!! I will be the main host for today!” host Duce Brapples exclaimed into his mic. “Lets start with a bit of information about our competitor who is put to the test to complete 5 dangerous stages in the tower and be examined by a pro at this tower, a gamer who has played this before and has died multiple times and respawned!

item.title: Ghosts - Introduction
item.description: Hi again and welcome back to day 2 of this blog! After some thinking, I decided to start off with something I’ve longed to write about for quite a long time now. So let’s hop in and start reading! Let’s start off with a bit of info about me! I play Roblox, an online gaming platform and I highly enjoy it. Call me weird or cheezy but hey! It’s what I enjoy!
